text: yusupha (a.Sa.)E temana samanani cakasani saru kari, potana bha'ini cakasani pahela, pachi te pyalane potana bha'ina samana manthi kadhyo. Ame yusupha (a.Sa.) Mate avi ja yukti kari hati, te badasahana kayada pramane a loko potana bha'ine la'i ja'i sakta nathi, parantu e ke allaha icchato hoya ame jena mate icchi'e tena hodda ucca kari da'i'e chi'e, dareka janakara para prathamikata rakhanara bijo janakara che
